src.groovy.grails.plugins.selenium
Class SeleniumTest

java.lang.Object
  src.groovy.grails.plugins.selenium.SeleniumTest

class SeleniumTest

Mixin for Selenese tests that provides access to the running Selenium instance, config, etc.

Returns the URL context path for the application.

GrailsSelenium getSelenium()

Returns the running Selenium instance.

void waitFor(java.lang.String message = null, groovy.lang.Closure condition)

Waits for a condition to become true, failing if the condition does not hold within the default timeout set on the selenium.

Method Detail

getConfig

groovy.util.ConfigObject getConfig()
Returns Selenium configuration.

getContextPath

java.lang.String getContextPath()
Returns the URL context path for the application. This is required to prefix URLs, e.g. to have selenium open the project root you would use:
selenium.open("$contextPath/")

getSelenium

GrailsSelenium getSelenium()
Returns the running Selenium instance.

waitFor

void waitFor(java.lang.String message = null, groovy.lang.Closure condition)
Waits for a condition to become true, failing if the condition does not hold within the default timeout set on the selenium.
